summary: A teacher arrives to El Romeral, a little town where he must face many cons to teach, many persons who doesn't want that children be educate to continuing exploiting the people under their ambitious plans.
cast: Cantinflas|Marga López|Víctor Alcocer|David Bravo|Raúl Martínez|Eduardo MacGregor|Luciano Hernández de la Vega|Juan Manuel González|René Dupeyrón|Gerardo del Castillo|Eduardo López Rojas|Rogelio Gaona|León Barroso|Claudio Sorel|Arturo de Córdova|José Luis Caro|Jorge Casanova|Margarita Delgado|José Dupeyrón|Angelines Fernández|Regino Herrera|Margarito Luna|Inés Murillo|Rubén Márquez|Ramón Valdés
title: El profe
